entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
